   19: %%
   20: -module(gen_statem_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   25: -behaviour(gen_statem).
   26: 
   27: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap,{seconds,10}}].
   32: 
   33: all() ->
   34:     [{group, start},
   35:      {group, start_handle_event},
   36:      {group, stop},
   37:      {group, stop_handle_event},
   38:      {group, abnormal},
   39:      {group, abnormal_handle_event},
   40:      shutdown, loop_start_fail, stop_and_reply, state_enter, event_order,
   41:      state_timeout, timeout_cancel_and_update,
   42:      event_types, generic_timers, code_change,
   43:      {group, sys},
   44:      hibernate, auto_hibernate, enter_loop, {group, undef_callbacks},
   45:      undef_in_terminate, {group, format_log},
   46:      reply_by_alias_with_payload,
   47:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection, send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
   48:      send_request_check_reqid_collection].
   49: 
   50: groups() ->
   51:     [{start, [], tcs(start)},
   52:      {start_handle_event, [], tcs(start)},
   53:      {stop, [], tcs(stop)},
   54:      {stop_handle_event, [], tcs(stop)},
   55:      {abnormal, [], tcs(abnormal)},
   56:      {abnormal_handle_event, [], tcs(abnormal)},
   57:      {sys, [], tcs(sys)},
   58:      {format_status, [], tcs(format_status)},
   59:      {sys_handle_event, [], tcs(sys)},
   60:      {undef_callbacks, [], tcs(undef_callbacks)},
   61:      {format_log, [], tcs(format_log)}].
   62: 
   63: tcs(start) ->
   64:     [start1, start2, start3, start4, start5a, start5b, start6, start7,
   65:      start8, start9, start10, start11, start12, next_events];
   66: tcs(stop) ->
   67:     [stop1, stop2, stop3, stop4, stop5, stop6, stop7, stop8, stop9, stop10];
   68: tcs(abnormal) ->
   69:     [abnormal1, abnormal1clean, abnormal1dirty,
   70:      abnormal2, abnormal3, abnormal4];
   71: tcs(sys) ->
   72:     [sys1, {group, format_status}, get_state, replace_state];
   73: tcs(format_status) ->
   74:     [call_format_status, error_format_status, terminate_crash_format,
   75:      format_all_status];
   76: tcs(undef_callbacks) ->
   77:     [undef_code_change, undef_terminate1, undef_terminate2,
   78:      pop_too_many];
   79: tcs(format_log) ->
   80:     [format_log_1, format_log_2].
   81: 
   82: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: 
   85: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   86:     ok.
   87: 
   88: init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
   89:   when GroupName =:= start_handle_event;
   90:        GroupName =:= stop_handle_event;
   91:        GroupName =:= abnormal_handle_event;
   92:        GroupName =:= sys_handle_event ->
   93:     [{callback_mode,handle_event_function}|Config];
   94: init_per_group(undef_callbacks, Config) ->
   95:     try compile_oc_statem(Config)
   96:     catch Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
   97:              {fail,{Class,Reason,Stacktrace}}
   98:     end,
   99:     Config;
  100: init_per_group(sys, Config) ->
  101:     compile_format_status_statem(Config),
  102:     Config;
  103: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  104:     Config.
  105: 
  106: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  107:     Config.
  108: 
  109: init_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
  110:     flush(),
  111: %%%    dbg:tracer(),
  112: %%%    dbg:p(all, c),
  113: %%%    dbg:tpl(gen_statem, cx),
  114: %%%    dbg:tpl(gen_statem, loop_receive, cx),
  115: %%%    dbg:tpl(gen_statem, loop_state_callback, cx),
  116: %%%    dbg:tpl(gen_statem, loop_callback_mode_result, cx),
  117: %%%    dbg:tpl(proc_lib, cx),
  118: %%%    dbg:tpl(gen, cx),
  119: %%%    dbg:tpl(sys, cx),
  120:     Config.
  121: 
  122: end_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
  123: %%%    dbg:stop(),
  124:     Config.
  125: 
  126: compile_oc_statem(Config) ->
  127:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  128:     StatemPath = filename:join(DataDir, "oc_statem.erl"),
  129:     {ok, oc_statem} = compile:file(StatemPath),
  130:     ok.
  131: 
  132: compile_format_status_statem(Config) ->
  133:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  134:     StatemPath = filename:join(DataDir, "format_status_statem.erl"),
  135:     {ok, format_status_statem} = compile:file(StatemPath),
  136:     ok.
  137: 
  138: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  139: -define(EXPECT_FAILURE(Code, Reason),
  140: 	try begin Code end of
  141: 	    Reason ->
  142: 		ct:fail({unexpected,Reason})
  143: 	catch
  144: 	    error:Reason -> Reason;
  145: 	    exit:Reason -> Reason
  146: 	end).
  147: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  148: 
  149: %% anonymous
  150: start1(Config) ->
  151:     %%OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  152: 
  153:     {ok,Pid0} =
  154: 	gen_statem:start_link(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), [{debug,[trace]}]),
  155:     ok = do_func_test(Pid0),
  156:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid0),
  157:     stop_it(Pid0),
  158: %%    stopped = gen_statem:call(Pid0, stop),
  159: %%    timeout =
  160: %%	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(Pid0, hej), Reason),
  161: 
  162:     %%process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  163:     ok = verify_empty_msgq(),
  164: 
  165:     {ok,{Pid1,Mon1}} = gen_statem:start_monitor(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  166:     ok = do_func_test(Pid1),
  167:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid1),
  168:     stop_it(Pid1),
  169:     receive
  170:         {'DOWN', Mon1, process, Pid1, _Reason} ->
  171:             ok
  172:     end,
  173:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  174:     
  175: %% anonymous w. shutdown
  176: start2(Config) ->
  177:     %% Dont link when shutdown
  178:     {ok,Pid0} =
  179: 	gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  180:     ok = do_func_test(Pid0),
  181:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid0),
  182:     stopped = gen_statem:call(Pid0, {stop,shutdown}),
  183:     check_stopped(Pid0),
  184:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  185: 
  186: %% anonymous with timeout
  187: start3(Config) ->
  188:     %%OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  189: 
  190:     {ok,Pid0} =
  191: 	gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), [{timeout,5}]),
  192:     ok = do_func_test(Pid0),
  193:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid0),
  194:     stop_it(Pid0),
  195: 
  196:     {error,timeout} =
  197: 	gen_statem:start(
  198: 	  ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, sleep), [{timeout,5}]),
  199: 
  200:     %%process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  201:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  202: 
  203: %% anonymous with ignore
  204: start4(Config) ->
  205:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  206: 
  207:     ignore = gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, ignore), []),
  208: 
  209:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  210:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  211: 
  212: %% anonymous with stop
  213: start5a(Config) ->
  214:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  215: 
  216:     {error,stopped} = gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, stop), []),
  217: 
  218:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  219:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  220: 
  221: %% anonymous with shutdown
  222: start5b(Config) ->
  223:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  224: 
  225:     {error, foobar} =
  226:         gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, {error, foobar}), []),
  227: 
  228:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  229:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  230: 
  231: %% anonymous linked
  232: start6(Config) ->
  233:     {ok,Pid} = gen_statem:start_link(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  234:     ok = do_func_test(Pid),
  235:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid),
  236:     stop_it(Pid),
  237: 
  238:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  239: 
  240: %% global register linked & monitored
  241: start7(Config) ->
  242:     STM = {global,my_stm},
  243: 
  244:     {ok,Pid} =
  245: 	gen_statem:start_link(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  246:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  247: 	gen_statem:start_link(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  248:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  249: 	gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  250:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  251: 	gen_statem:start_monitor(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  252: 
  253:     ok = do_func_test(Pid),
  254:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid),
  255:     ok = do_func_test(STM),
  256:     ok = do_sync_func_test(STM),
  257:     stop_it(STM),
  258: 
  259:     ok = verify_empty_msgq(),
  260: 
  261:     {ok,{Pid1,Mon1}} =
  262: 	gen_statem:start_monitor(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  263:     {error,{already_started,Pid1}} =
  264: 	gen_statem:start_link(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  265:     {error,{already_started,Pid1}} =
  266: 	gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  267:     {error,{already_started,Pid1}} =
  268: 	gen_statem:start_monitor(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  269: 
  270:     ok = do_func_test(Pid1),
  271:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid1),
  272:     ok = do_func_test(STM),
  273:     ok = do_sync_func_test(STM),
  274:     stop_it(STM),
  275: 
  276:     receive
  277:         {'DOWN', Mon1, process, Pid1, _Reason} ->
  278:             ok
  279:     end,
  280: 
  281:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  282: 
  283: 
  284: %% local register
  285: start8(Config) ->
  286:     %%OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  287:     Name = my_stm,
  288:     STM = {local,Name},
  289: 
  290:     {ok,Pid} =
  291: 	gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  292:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  293: 	gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  294: 
  295:     ok = do_func_test(Pid),
  296:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid),
  297:     ok = do_func_test(Name),
  298:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Name),
  299:     stop_it(Pid),
  300: 
  301:     %%process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  302:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  303: 
  304: %% local register linked & monitored
  305: start9(Config) ->
  306:     %%OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  307:     Name = my_stm,
  308:     STM = {local,Name},
  309: 
  310:     {ok,Pid} =
  311: 	gen_statem:start_link(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  312:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  313: 	gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  314: 
  315:     ok = do_func_test(Pid),
  316:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid),
  317:     ok = do_func_test(Name),
  318:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Name),
  319:     stop_it(Pid),
  320: 
  321:     %%process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  322:     ok = verify_empty_msgq(),
  323: 
  324:     {ok,{Pid1,Mon1}} =
  325: 	gen_statem:start_monitor(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  326:     {error,{already_started,Pid1}} =
  327: 	gen_statem:start_monitor(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  328: 
  329:     ok = do_func_test(Pid1),
  330:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid1),
  331:     ok = do_func_test(Name),
  332:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Name),
  333:     stop_it(Pid1),
  334: 
  335:     receive
  336:         {'DOWN', Mon1, process, Pid1, _Reason} ->
  337:             ok
  338:     end,
  339: 
  340:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  341: 
  342: %% global register
  343: start10(Config) ->
  344:     STM = {global,my_stm},
  345: 
  346:     {ok,Pid} =
  347: 	gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  348:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  349: 	gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  350:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  351: 	gen_statem:start_link(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  352: 
  353:     ok = do_func_test(Pid),
  354:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid),
  355:     ok = do_func_test(STM),
  356:     ok = do_sync_func_test(STM),
  357:     stop_it(STM),
  358: 
  359:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  360: 
  361: %% Stop registered processes
  362: start11(Config) ->
  363:     Name = my_stm,
  364:     LocalSTM = {local,Name},
  365:     GlobalSTM = {global,Name},
  366: 
  367:     {ok,Pid} =
  368: 	gen_statem:start_link(LocalSTM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  369:     stop_it(Pid),
  370: 
  371:     {ok,_Pid1} =
  372: 	gen_statem:start_link(LocalSTM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  373:     stop_it(Name),
  374: 
  375:     {ok,Pid2} =
  376: 	gen_statem:start(GlobalSTM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  377:     stop_it(Pid2),
  378:     receive after 1 -> true end,
  379:     Result =
  380: 	gen_statem:start(GlobalSTM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  381:     ct:log("Result = ~p~n",[Result]),
  382:     {ok,_Pid3} = Result,
  383:     stop_it(GlobalSTM),
  384: 
  385:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  386: 
  387: %% Via register linked
  388: start12(Config) ->
  389:     dummy_via:reset(),
  390:     VIA = {via,dummy_via,my_stm},
  391: 
  392:     {ok,Pid} =
  393: 	gen_statem:start_link(VIA, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  394:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  395: 	gen_statem:start_link(VIA, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  396:     {error,{already_started,Pid}} =
  397: 	gen_statem:start(VIA, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  398: 
  399:     ok = do_func_test(Pid),
  400:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid),
  401:     ok = do_func_test(VIA),
  402:     ok = do_sync_func_test(VIA),
  403:     stop_it(VIA),
  404: 
  405:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  406: 
  407: 
  408: %% Anonymous, reason 'normal'
  409: stop1(Config) ->
  410:     {ok,Pid} = gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  411:     ok = gen_statem:stop(Pid),
  412:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  413:     noproc =
  414: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(Pid), Reason).
  415: 
  416: %% Anonymous, other reason
  417: stop2(Config) ->
  418:     {ok,Pid} = gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  419:     ok = gen_statem:stop(Pid, other_reason, infinity),
  420:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  421:     ok.
  422: 
  423: %% Anonymous, invalid timeout
  424: stop3(Config) ->
  425:     {ok,Pid} = gen_statem:start(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  426:     _ =
  427: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(
  428: 	   gen_statem:stop(Pid, other_reason, invalid_timeout),
  429: 	   Reason),
  430:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  431:     ok = gen_statem:stop(Pid),
  432:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  433:     ok.
  434: 
  435: %% Registered name
  436: stop4(Config) ->
  437:     {ok,Pid} =
  438: 	gen_statem:start(
  439: 	  {local,to_stop},?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  440:     ok = gen_statem:stop(to_stop),
  441:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  442:     noproc =
  443: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(to_stop), Reason),
  444:     ok.
  445: 
  446: %% Registered name and local node
  447: stop5(Config) ->
  448:     Name = to_stop,
  449:     {ok,Pid} =
  450: 	gen_statem:start(
  451: 	  {local,Name},?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  452:     ok = gen_statem:stop({Name,node()}),
  453:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  454:     noproc =
  455: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop({Name,node()}), Reason),
  456:     ok.
  457: 
  458: %% Globally registered name
  459: stop6(Config) ->
  460:     STM = {global,to_stop},
  461:     {ok,Pid} = gen_statem:start(STM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  462:     ok = gen_statem:stop(STM),
  463:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  464:     noproc =
  465: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(STM), Reason),
  466:     ok.
  467: 
  468: %% 'via' registered name
  469: stop7(Config) ->
  470:     VIA = {via,dummy_via,to_stop},
  471:     dummy_via:reset(),
  472:     {ok,Pid} = gen_statem:start(VIA, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  473:     ok = gen_statem:stop(VIA),
  474:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  475:     noproc =
  476: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(VIA), Reason),
  477:     ok.
  478: 
  479: %% Anonymous on remote node
  480: stop8(Config) ->
  481:     {ok,Peer,NodeName} = ?CT_PEER(),
  482:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  483:     rpc:block_call(NodeName, code, add_path, [Dir]),
  484:     {ok,Pid} =
  485:         rpc:block_call(
  486:           NodeName, gen_statem,start,
  487:           [?MODULE,start_arg(Config, []),[]]),
  488:     ok = gen_statem:stop(Pid),
  489:     false = rpc:block_call(NodeName, erlang, is_process_alive, [Pid]),
  490:     noproc =
  491:         ?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(Pid), Reason1),
  492: 
  493:     peer:stop(Peer),
  494:     {{nodedown,NodeName},{sys,terminate,_}} =
  495: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(Pid), Reason2),
  496:     ok.
  497: 
  498: %% Registered name on remote node
  499: stop9(Config) ->
  500:     Name = to_stop,
  501:     LocalSTM = {local,Name},
  502:     {ok,Peer,NodeName} = ?CT_PEER(),
  503: 
  504:     STM = {Name,NodeName},
  505:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  506:     rpc:block_call(NodeName, code, add_path, [Dir]),
  507:     {ok,Pid} =
  508:         rpc:block_call(
  509:           NodeName, gen_statem, start,
  510:           [LocalSTM,?MODULE,start_arg(Config, []),[]]),
  511:     ok = gen_statem:stop(STM),
  512:     undefined = rpc:block_call(NodeName,erlang,whereis,[Name]),
  513:     false = rpc:block_call(NodeName,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  514:     noproc =
  515:         ?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(STM), Reason1),
  516:     peer:stop(Peer),
  517: 
  518:     {{nodedown,NodeName},{sys,terminate,_}} =
  519: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(STM), Reason2),
  520:     ok.
  521: 
  522: %% Globally registered name on remote node
  523: stop10(Config) ->
  524:     STM = {global,to_stop},
  525:     {ok,Peer,NodeName} = ?CT_PEER(),
  526:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  527:     rpc:block_call(NodeName,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  528:     {ok,Pid} =
  529:         rpc:block_call(
  530:           NodeName, gen_statem, start,
  531:           [STM,?MODULE,start_arg(Config, []),[]]),
  532:     global:sync(),
  533:     ok = gen_statem:stop(STM),
  534:     false = rpc:block_call(NodeName, erlang, is_process_alive, [Pid]),
  535:     noproc =
  536:         ?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(STM), Reason1),
  537:     peer:stop(Peer),
  538: 
  539:     noproc =
  540: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:stop(STM), Reason2),
  541:     ok.
  542: 
  543: %% Check that time outs in calls work
  544: abnormal1(Config) ->
  545:     Name = abnormal1,
  546:     LocalSTM = {local,Name},
  547: 
  548:     {ok, _Pid} =
  549: 	gen_statem:start(LocalSTM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  550: 
  551:     %% timeout call.
  552:     delayed = gen_statem:call(Name, {delayed_answer,100}, 2000),
  553:     {timeout,_} =
  554: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(
  555: 	   gen_statem:call(Name, {delayed_answer,2000}, 100),
  556: 	   Reason),
  557:     ok = gen_statem:stop(Name),
  558:     ct:sleep(1100),
  559:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  560: 
  561: %% Check that time outs in calls work
  562: abnormal1clean(Config) ->
  563:     Name = abnormal1clean,
  564:     LocalSTM = {local,Name},
  565: 
  566:     {ok, _Pid} =
  567: 	gen_statem:start(LocalSTM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  568: 
  569:     %% timeout call.
  570:     delayed =
  571: 	gen_statem:call(Name, {delayed_answer,1}, {clean_timeout,100}),
  572:     {timeout,_} =
  573: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(
  574: 	   gen_statem:call(
  575: 	     Name, {delayed_answer,1000}, {clean_timeout,10}),
  576: 	   Reason),
  577:     ok = gen_statem:stop(Name),
  578:     ct:sleep(1100),
  579:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  580: 
  581: %% Check that time outs in calls work
  582: abnormal1dirty(Config) ->
  583:     Name = abnormal1dirty,
  584:     LocalSTM = {local,Name},
  585: 
  586:     {ok, _Pid} =
  587: 	gen_statem:start(LocalSTM, ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  588: 
  589:     %% timeout call.
  590:     delayed =
  591: 	gen_statem:call(Name, {delayed_answer,1}, {dirty_timeout,100}),
  592:     {timeout,_} =
  593: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(
  594: 	   gen_statem:call(
  595: 	     Name, {delayed_answer,1000}, {dirty_timeout,10}),
  596: 	   Reason),
  597:     ok = gen_statem:stop(Name),
  598:     ct:sleep(1100),
  599:     case flush() of
  600: 	[] -> ok
  601:     end.
  602: 
  603: %% Check that bad return values makes the stm crash. Note that we must
  604: %% trap exit since we must link to get the real bad_return_ error
  605: abnormal2(Config) ->
  606:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  607:     {ok,Pid} =
  608:         gen_statem:start_link(
  609:           ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), [{debug,[log]}]),
  610: 
  611:     %% bad return value in the gen_statem loop
  612:     Cause = bad_return_from_state_function,
  613:     {{{Cause,badreturn},_},_} =
  614: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(Pid, badreturn), Reason),
  615:     receive
  616: 	{'EXIT',Pid,{{Cause,badreturn},_}} -> ok
  617:     after 5000 ->
  618: 	    ct:fail(gen_statem_did_not_die)
  619:     end,
  620: 
  621:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  622:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  623: 
  624: %% Check that bad return actions makes the stm crash. Note that we must
  625: %% trap exit since we must link to get the real bad_return_ error
  626: abnormal3(Config) ->
  627:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  628:     {ok,Pid} =
  629:         gen_statem:start_link(
  630:           ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), [{debug,[log]}]),
  631: 
  632:     %% bad return value in the gen_statem loop
  633:     Cause = bad_action_from_state_function,
  634:     {{{Cause,badaction},_},_} =
  635: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(Pid, badaction), Reason),
  636:     receive
  637: 	{'EXIT',Pid,{{Cause,badaction},_}} -> ok
  638:     after 5000 ->
  639: 	    ct:fail(gen_statem_did_not_die)
  640:     end,
  641: 
  642:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  643:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  644: 
  645: %% Check that bad timeout actions makes the stm crash. Note that we must
  646: %% trap exit since we must link to get the real bad_return_ error
  647: abnormal4(Config) ->
  648:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  649:     {ok,Pid} =
  650:         gen_statem:start_link(
  651:           ?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), [{debug,[log]}]),
  652: 
  653:     %% bad return value in the gen_statem loop
  654:     BadTimeout = {badtimeout,4711,ouch},
  655:     Cause = bad_action_from_state_function,
  656:     {{{Cause,BadTimeout},_},_} =
  657: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(Pid, {badtimeout,BadTimeout}), Reason),
  658:     receive
  659: 	{'EXIT',Pid,{{Cause,BadTimeout},_}} -> ok
  660:     after 5000 ->
  661: 	    ct:fail(gen_statem_did_not_die)
  662:     end,
  663: 
  664:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  665:     ok = verify_empty_msgq().
  666: 
  667: shutdown(Config) ->
  668:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  669: 
  670:     {ok,Pid0} = gen_statem:start_link(?MODULE, start_arg(Config, []), []),
  671:     ok = do_func_test(Pid0),
  672:     ok = do_sync_func_test(Pid0),
  673:     stopped = gen_statem:call(Pid0, {stop,{shutdown,reason}}),
  674:     receive {'EXIT',Pid0,{shutdown,reason}} -> ok end,
  675:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  676: 
  677:     {noproc,_} =
  678: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(Pid0, hej), Reason),
  679: 
  680:     receive
  681: 	Any ->
  682: 	    ct:log("Unexpected: ~p", [Any]),
  683: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Any})
  684:     after 500 ->
  685: 	    ok
  686:     end.
  687: 
  688: 
  689: loop_start_fail(Config) ->
  690:     _ = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  691:     loop_start_fail(
  692:       Config,
  693:       [{start, []}, {start, [link]},
  694:        {start_link, []},
  695:        {start_monitor, [link]}, {start_monitor, []}]).
  696: 
  697: loop_start_fail(_Config, []) ->
  698:     ok;
  699: loop_start_fail(Config, [{Start, Opts} | Start_Opts]) ->
  700:     loop_start_fail(
  701:       fun gen_statem:Start/3,
  702:       {ets, {return, {stop, failed_to_start}}}, Opts,
  703:       fun ({error, failed_to_start}) -> ok end),
  704:     loop_start_fail(
  705:       fun gen_statem:Start/3,
  706:       {ets, {return, ignore}}, Opts,
  707:       fun (ignore) -> ok end),
  708:     loop_start_fail(
  709:       fun gen_statem:Start/3,
  710:       {ets, {return, 4711}}, Opts,
  711:       fun ({error, {bad_return_from_init, 4711}}) -> ok end),
  712:     loop_start_fail(
  713:       fun gen_statem:Start/3,
  714:       {ets, {crash, error, bailout}}, Opts,
  715:       fun ({error, bailout}) -> ok end),
  716:     loop_start_fail(
  717:       fun gen_statem:Start/3,
  718:       {ets, {crash, exit, bailout}}, Opts,
  719:       fun ({error, bailout}) -> ok end),
  720:     loop_start_fail(
  721:       fun gen_statem:Start/3,
  722:       {ets, {wait, 1000, void}}, [{timeout, 200} | Opts],
  723:       fun ({error, timeout}) -> ok end),
  724:     loop_start_fail(Config, Start_Opts).
  725: 
  726: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun) ->
  727:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, 5).
  728: %%
  729: loop_start_fail(_GenStartFun, _Arg, _Opts, _ValidateFun, 0) ->
  730:     ok;
  731: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N) ->
  732:     ok = ValidateFun(GenStartFun(?MODULE, Arg, Opts)),
  733:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N - 1).
  734: 
  735: 
  736: 
  737: stop_and_reply(_Config) ->
  738:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  739: 
  740:     Machine =
  741: 	%% Abusing the internal format of From...
  742: 	#{init =>
  743: 	      fun () ->
  744: 		      {ok,start,undefined}
  745: 	      end,
  746: 	  start =>
  747: 	      fun (cast, {echo,From1,Reply1}, undefined) ->
  748: 		      {next_state,wait,{reply,From1,Reply1}}
  749: 	      end,
  750: 	  wait =>
  751: 	      fun (cast, {stop_and_reply,Reason,From2,Reply2},R1) ->
  752: 		      {stop_and_reply,Reason,
  753: 		       [R1,{reply,From2,Reply2}]}
  754: 	      end},
  755:     {ok,STM} =
  756: 	gen_statem:start_link(?MODULE, {map_statem,Machine,[]}, []),
  757: 
  758:     Self = self(),
  759:     Tag1 = make_ref(),
  760:     gen_statem:cast(STM, {echo,{Self,Tag1},reply1}),
  761:     Tag2 = make_ref(),
  762:     gen_statem:cast(STM, {stop_and_reply,reason,{Self,Tag2},reply2}),
  763:     case flush() of
  764: 	[{Tag1,reply1},{Tag2,reply2},{'EXIT',STM,reason}] ->
  765: 	    ok;
  766: 	Other1 ->
  767: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Other1})
  768:     end,
  769: 
  770:     {noproc,_} =
  771: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(STM, hej), Reason),
  772:     case flush() of
  773: 	[] ->
  774: 	    ok;
  775: 	Other2 ->
  776: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Other2})
  777:     end.
  778: 
  779: 
  780: 
  781: state_enter(_Config) ->
  782:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  783:     Self = self(),
  784: 
  785:     Machine =
  786: 	%% Abusing the internal format of From...
  787: 	#{init =>
  788: 	      fun () ->
  789: 		      {ok,start,1}
  790: 	      end,
  791: 	  start =>
  792: 	      fun (enter, Prev, N) ->
  793: 		      Self ! {N,enter,start,Prev},
  794: 		      {keep_state,N + 1};
  795: 		  (internal, Prev, N) ->
  796: 		      Self ! {N,internal,start,Prev},
  797: 		      {keep_state,N + 1};
  798:                   (timeout, M, N) ->
  799:                       {keep_state, N + 1,
  800:                        {reply, {Self,N}, {timeout,M}}};
  801: 		  ({call,From}, repeat, N) ->
  802: 		      {repeat_state,N + 1,
  803: 		       [{reply,From,{N,repeat,start}}]};
  804: 		  ({call,From}, echo, N) ->
  805: 		      {next_state,wait,N + 1,
  806: 		       [{reply,From,{N,echo,start}},{timeout,0,N}]};
  807: 		  ({call,From}, {stop,Reason}, N) ->
  808: 		      {stop_and_reply,Reason,
  809: 		       [{reply,From,{N,stop}}],N + 1}
  810: 	      end,
  811: 	  wait =>
  812: 	      fun (enter, Prev, N) when N < 5 ->
  813: 		      {repeat_state,N + 1,
  814: 		       [{reply,{Self,N},{enter,Prev}},
  815:                         {timeout,0,N},
  816:                         {state_timeout,0,N}]};
  817: 		  (enter, Prev, N) ->
  818: 		      Self ! {N,enter,wait,Prev},
  819: 		      {keep_state,N + 1,
  820:                        [{timeout,0,N},
  821:                         {state_timeout,0,N}]};
  822:                   (timeout, M, N) ->
  823:                       {keep_state, N + 1,
  824:                        {reply, {Self,N}, {timeout,M}}};
  825:                   (state_timeout, M, N) ->
  826:                       {keep_state, N + 1,
  827:                        {reply, {Self,N}, {state_timeout,M}}};
  828: 		  ({call,From}, repeat, N) ->
  829: 		      {repeat_state_and_data,
  830: 		       [{reply,From,{N,repeat,wait}},
  831:                         {timeout,0,N}]};
  832: 		  ({call,From}, echo, N) ->
  833: 		      {next_state,start,N + 1,
  834: 		       [{next_event,internal,wait},
  835: 			{reply,From,{N,echo,wait}}]}
  836: 	      end},
  837:     {ok,STM} =
  838: 	gen_statem:start_link(
  839: 	  ?MODULE, {map_statem,Machine,[state_enter]},
  840:           [{debug,[trace,{log,17}]}]),
  841:     ok = sys:log(STM, false),
  842:     ok = sys:log(STM, true),
  843: 
  844:     [{1,enter,start,start}] = flush(),
  845:     {2,echo,start} = gen_statem:call(STM, echo),
  846:     [{3,{enter,start}},
  847:      {4,{enter,start}},
  848:      {5,enter,wait,start},
  849:      {6,{timeout,5}},
  850:      {7,{state_timeout,5}}] = flush(),
  851:     {wait,[8|_]} = sys:get_state(STM),
  852:     {8,repeat,wait} = gen_statem:call(STM, repeat),
  853:     [{8,enter,wait,wait},
  854:      {9,{timeout,8}},
  855:      {10,{state_timeout,8}}] = flush(),
  856:     {11,echo,wait} = gen_statem:call(STM, echo),
  857:     [{12,enter,start,wait},
  858:      {13,internal,start,wait}] = flush(),
  859:     {14,repeat,start} = gen_statem:call(STM, repeat),
  860:     [{15,enter,start,start}] = flush(),
  861: 
  862:     {ok,Log} = sys:log(STM, get),
  863:     io:format("sys:log ~p~n", [Log]),
  864:     ok = sys:log(STM, print),
  865: 
  866:     {16,stop} = gen_statem:call(STM, {stop,bye}),
  867:     [{'EXIT',STM,bye}] = flush(),
  868: 
  869:     {noproc,_} =
  870: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(STM, hej), Reason),
  871:     case flush() of
  872: 	[] ->
  873: 	    ok;
  874: 	Other2 ->
  875: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Other2})
  876:     end.
  877: 
  878: 
  879: 
  880: event_order(_Config) ->
  881:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  882: 
  883:     Machine =
  884: 	%% Abusing the internal format of From...
  885: 	#{init =>
  886: 	      fun () ->
  887: 		      {ok,start,undefined}
  888: 	      end,
  889: 	  start =>
  890: 	      fun (cast, _, _) ->
  891: 		      {keep_state_and_data,postpone}; %% Handled in 'buffer'
  892: 		  ({call,From}, {buffer,Pid,[Tag3,Tag4,Tag5]},
  893: 		   undefined) ->
  894: 		      {next_state,buffer,[],
  895: 		       [{next_event,internal,{reply,{Pid,Tag3},ok3}},
  896: 			{next_event,internal,{reply,{Pid,Tag4},ok4}},
  897: 			{timeout,0,{reply,{Pid,Tag5},ok5}},
  898: 			%% The timeout should not happen since there
  899: 			%% are events that cancel it i.e next_event
  900: 			%% and postponed
  901: 			{reply,From,ok}]}
  902: 	      end,
  903: 	  buffer =>
  904: 	      fun (internal, Reply, Replies) ->
  905: 		      {keep_state,[Reply|Replies]};
  906: 		  (timeout, Reply, Replies) ->
  907: 		      {keep_state,[Reply|Replies]};
  908: 		  (cast, Reply, Replies) ->
  909: 		      {keep_state,[Reply|Replies]};
  910: 		  ({call,From}, {stop,Reason}, Replies) ->
  911: 		      {next_state,stop,undefined,
  912: 		       lists:reverse(
  913: 			 Replies,
  914: 			 [{reply,From,ok},
  915: 			  {next_event,internal,{stop,Reason}}])}
  916: 	      end,
  917: 	  stop =>
  918: 	      fun (internal, Result, undefined) ->
  919: 		      Result
  920: 	      end},
  921: 
  922:     {ok,STM} = gen_statem:start_link(?MODULE, {map_statem,Machine,[]}, []),
  923:     Self = self(),
  924:     Tag1 = make_ref(),
  925:     gen_statem:cast(STM, {reply,{Self,Tag1},ok1}),
  926:     Tag2 = make_ref(),
  927:     gen_statem:cast(STM, {reply,{Self,Tag2},ok2}),
  928:     Tag3 = make_ref(),
  929:     Tag4 = make_ref(),
  930:     Tag5 = make_ref(),
  931:     ok = gen_statem:call(STM, {buffer,Self,[Tag3,Tag4,Tag5]}),
  932:     ok = gen_statem:call(STM, {stop,reason}),
  933:     case flush() of
  934: 	[{Tag3,ok3},{Tag4,ok4},{Tag1,ok1},{Tag2,ok2},
  935: 	 {'EXIT',STM,reason}] ->
  936: 	    ok;
  937: 	Other1 ->
  938: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Other1})
  939:     end,
  940: 
  941:     {noproc,_} =
  942: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(STM, hej), Reason),
  943:     case flush() of
  944: 	[] ->
  945: 	    ok;
  946: 	Other2 ->
  947: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Other2})
  948:     end.
  949: 
  950: 
  951: 
  952: state_timeout(_Config) ->
  953:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  954: 
  955:     Machine =
  956: 	#{init =>
  957: 	      fun () ->
  958: 		      {ok,start,0}
  959: 	      end,
  960: 	  start =>
  961: 	      fun
  962: 		  ({call,From}, {go,Time}, 0)  ->
  963: 		      self() ! message_to_self,
  964: 		      {next_state, state1, {Time,From},
  965: 		       %% Verify that internal events goes before external
  966: 		       [{timeout,Time,1}, % Exercise different cancel code path
  967:                         {state_timeout,Time,1},
  968: 			{next_event,internal,1}]}
  969: 	      end,
  970: 	  state1 =>
  971: 	      fun
  972: 		  (internal, 1, Data) ->
  973: 		      %% Verify that a state change cancels timeout 1
  974: 		      {next_state, state2, Data,
  975: 		       [{timeout,0,2},
  976: 			{state_timeout,0,2},
  977: 			{next_event,internal,2}]}
  978: 	      end,
  979: 	  state2 =>
  980: 	      fun
  981: 		  (internal, 2, Data) ->
  982: 		      %% Verify that {state_timeout,0,_}
  983: 		      %% comes after next_event and that
  984: 		      %% {timeout,0,_} is cancelled by
  985: 		      %% pending {state_timeout,0,_}
  986: 		      {keep_state, {ok,2,Data},
  987: 		       [{timeout,0,3}]};
  988: 		  (state_timeout, 2, {ok,2,Data}) ->
  989: 		      %% Verify that timeout 0's are processed
  990: 		      %% in order
  991: 		      {keep_state, {ok,3,Data},
  992: 		       [{timeout,0,4},{state_timeout,0,5}]};
  993: 		  (timeout, 4, {ok,3,Data}) ->
  994: 		      %% Verify that timeout 0 is cancelled by
  995: 		      %% a state_timeout 0 event and that
  996: 		      %% state_timeout 0 can be restarted
  997: 		      {keep_state, {ok,4,Data},
  998: 		       [{state_timeout,0,6},{timeout,0,7}]};
  999: 		  (state_timeout, 6, {ok,4,{Time,From}}) ->
 1000: 		      {next_state, state3, 6,
 1001: 		       [{reply,From,ok},
 1002: 			{state_timeout,Time,8}]}
 1003: 	      end,
 1004: 	  state3 =>
 1005: 	      fun
 1006: 		  (info, message_to_self, 6) ->
 1007: 		      {keep_state, 7};
 1008: 		  ({call,From}, check, 7) ->
 1009: 		      {keep_state, From};
 1010: 		  (state_timeout, 8, From) ->
 1011: 		      {stop_and_reply, normal,
 1012: 		       {reply,From,ok}}
 1013: 	      end},
 1014: 
 1015:     {ok,STM} =
 1016:         gen_statem:start_link(
 1017:           ?MODULE, {map_statem,Machine,[]}, [{debug,[trace]}]),
 1018:     TRef = erlang:start_timer(1000, self(), kull),
 1019:     ok = gen_statem:call(STM, {go,500}),
 1020:     ok = gen_statem:call(STM, check),
 1021:     receive
 1022: 	{timeout,TRef,kull} ->
 1023: 	    ct:fail(late_timeout)
 1024:     after 0 ->
 1025: 	    receive
 1026: 		{timeout,TRef,kull} ->
 1027: 		    ok
 1028: 	    after 1000 ->
 1029: 		    ct:fail(no_check_timeout)
 1030: 	    end
 1031:     end,
 1032:     receive
 1033: 	{'EXIT',STM,normal} ->
 1034: 	    ok
 1035:     after 500 ->
 1036: 	    ct:fail(did_not_stop)
 1037:     end,
 1038: 
 1039:     verify_empty_msgq().
 1040: 
 1041: 
 1042: 
 1043: timeout_cancel_and_update(_Config) ->
 1044:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1045:     %%
 1046:     Machine =
 1047: 	#{init =>
 1048: 	      fun () ->
 1049: 		      {ok,start,0}
 1050: 	      end,
 1051: 	  start =>
 1052: 	      fun
 1053: 		  ({call,From}, test, 0)  ->
 1054: 		      self() ! message_to_self,
 1055: 		      {next_state, state1, From,
 1056: 		       %% Verify that internal events goes before external
 1057: 		       [{state_timeout,17,1},
 1058: 			{next_event,internal,1}]}
 1059: 	      end,
 1060: 	  state1 =>
 1061: 	      fun
 1062: 		  (internal, 1, _) ->
 1063:                       {keep_state_and_data,
 1064:                        [{state_timeout,cancel},
 1065:                         {{timeout,a},17,1}]};
 1066:                   (info, message_to_self, _) ->
 1067:                       {keep_state_and_data,
 1068:                        [{{timeout,a},update,a}]};
 1069:                   ({timeout,a}, a, Data) ->
 1070:                       {next_state,state2,Data,
 1071:                        [{state_timeout,17,2},
 1072:                         {next_event,internal,2}]}
 1073:               end,
 1074: 	  state2 =>
 1075: 	      fun
 1076: 		  (internal, 2, _) ->
 1077:                       receive after 50 -> ok end,
 1078:                       %% Now state_timeout 17 should have triggered
 1079:                       {keep_state_and_data,
 1080:                        [{state_timeout,update,b},
 1081:                         {timeout,17,2}]};
 1082:                   (state_timeout, b, From) ->
 1083:                       {next_state,state3,3,
 1084:                        [{reply,From,ok},
 1085:                         17000]}
 1086: 	      end,
 1087:           state3 =>
 1088:               fun
 1089:                   ({call,From}, stop, 3) ->
 1090:                       {stop_and_reply, normal,
 1091:                        [{reply,From,ok}]}
 1092:               end
 1093:          },
 1094:     %%
 1095:     {ok,STM} =
 1096:         gen_statem:start_link(
 1097:           ?MODULE, {map_statem,Machine,[]}, [{debug,[trace]}]),
 1098:     ok = gen_statem:call(STM, test),
 1099:     {status, STM, {module,gen_statem}, Info} = sys:get_status(STM),
 1100:     ct:log("Status info: ~p~n", [Info]),
 1101:     {_,Timeouts} = dig_data_tuple(Info),
 1102:     {_, {1,[{timeout,17000}]}} = lists:keyfind("Time-outs", 1, Timeouts),
 1103:     %%
 1104:     ok = gen_statem:call(STM, stop),
 1105:     receive
 1106: 	{'EXIT',STM,normal} ->
 1107: 	    ok
 1108:     after 500 ->
 1109: 	    ct:fail(did_not_stop)
 1110:     end,
 1111:     %%
 1112:     verify_empty_msgq().
 1113: 
 1114: dig_data_tuple([{data,_} = DataTuple|_]) -> DataTuple;
 1115: dig_data_tuple([H|T]) when is_list(H) ->
 1116:     case dig_data_tuple(H) of
 1117:         false -> dig_data_tuple(T);
 1118:         DataTuple -> DataTuple
 1119:     end;
 1120: dig_data_tuple([_|T]) -> dig_data_tuple(T);
 1121: dig_data_tuple([]) -> false.
 1122: 
 1123: 
 1124: 
 1125: %% Test that all event types can be sent with {next_event,EventType,_}
 1126: event_types(_Config) ->
 1127:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1128: 
 1129:     Machine =
 1130: 	%% Abusing the internal format of From...
 1131: 	#{init =>
 1132: 	      fun () ->
 1133: 		      {ok, start1, undefined,
 1134: 		       [{next_event,internal,0}]}
 1135: 	      end,
 1136: 	  start1 =>
 1137: 	      fun (internal, 0, undefined) ->
 1138: 		      {next_state, start2, undefined}
 1139: 	      end,
 1140: 	  start2 =>
 1141: 	      fun ({call,_} = Call, Req, undefined) ->
 1142: 		      {next_state, state1, undefined,
 1143: 		       [{next_event,internal,1},
 1144: 			{next_event,state_timeout,2},
 1145: 			{next_event,timeout,3},
 1146: 			{next_event,info,4},
 1147: 			{next_event,cast,5},
 1148: 			{next_event,{timeout,6}, 6},
 1149: 			{next_event,Call,Req}]}
 1150: 	      end,
 1151: 	  state1 =>
 1152: 	      fun (internal, 1, undefined) ->
 1153: 		      {next_state, state2, undefined}
 1154: 	      end,
 1155: 	  state2 =>
 1156: 	      fun (state_timeout, 2, undefined) ->
 1157: 		      {next_state, state3, undefined}
 1158: 	      end,
 1159: 	  state3 =>
 1160: 	      fun (timeout, 3, undefined) ->
 1161: 		      {next_state, state4, undefined}
 1162: 	      end,
 1163: 	  state4 =>
 1164: 	      fun (info, 4, undefined) ->
 1165: 		      {next_state, state5, undefined}
 1166: 	      end,
 1167: 	  state5 =>
 1168: 	      fun (cast, 5, undefined) ->
 1169: 		      {next_state, state6, undefined}
 1170: 	      end,
 1171: 	  state6 =>
 1172: 	      fun ({timeout,6}, 6, undefined) ->
 1173: 		      {next_state, state7, undefined}
 1174: 	      end,
 1175: 	  state7 =>
 1176: 	      fun ({call,From}, stop, undefined) ->
 1177: 		      {stop_and_reply, shutdown,
 1178: 		       [{reply,From,stopped}]}
 1179: 	      end},
 1180:     {ok,STM} =
 1181: 	gen_statem:start_link(
 1182: 	  ?MODULE, {map_statem,Machine,[]}, [{debug,[trace]}]),
 1183: 
 1184:     stopped = gen_statem:call(STM, stop),
 1185:     receive
 1186: 	{'EXIT',STM,shutdown} ->
 1187: 	    ok
 1188:     after 500 ->
 1189: 	    ct:fail(did_not_stop)
 1190:     end,
 1191: 
 1192:     {noproc,_} =
 1193: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(STM, hej), Reason),
 1194:     case flush() of
 1195: 	[] ->
 1196: 	    ok;
 1197: 	Other2 ->
 1198: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Other2})
 1199:     end.
 1200: 
 1201:

 1203: generic_timers(_Config) ->
 1204:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1205: 
 1206:     Machine =
 1207: 	%% Abusing the internal format of From...
 1208: 	#{init =>
 1209: 	      fun () ->
 1210: 		      {ok, start, undefined}
 1211: 	      end,
 1212: 	  start =>
 1213: 	      fun ({call,_} = Call, Req, undefined) ->
 1214: 		      {next_state, state1, undefined,
 1215: 		       [{{timeout,a},1500,1},
 1216: 			{state_timeout,1500,1},
 1217: 			{{timeout,b},1000,1},
 1218: 			{next_event,Call,Req}]}
 1219: 	      end,
 1220: 	  state1 =>
 1221: 	      fun ({call,_} = Call, Req, undefined) ->
 1222: 		      T = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 500,
 1223: 		      {next_state, state2, undefined,
 1224: 		       [{{timeout,c},T,2,{abs,true}},
 1225: 			{{timeout,d},0,2,[{abs,false}]},
 1226: 			{timeout,0,2},
 1227: 			{{timeout,b},infinity,2},
 1228: 			{{timeout,a},1000,{Call,Req}}]}
 1229: 	      end,
 1230: 	  state2 =>
 1231: 	      fun ({timeout,d}, 2, undefined) ->
 1232: 		      {next_state, state3, undefined}
 1233: 	      end,
 1234: 	  state3 =>
 1235: 	      fun ({timeout,c}, 2, undefined) ->
 1236: 		      {next_state, state4, undefined}
 1237: 	      end,
 1238: 	  state4 =>
 1239: 	      fun ({timeout,a}, {{call,From},stop}, undefined) ->
 1240: 		      {stop_and_reply, shutdown,
 1241: 		       [{reply,From,stopped}]}
 1242: 	      end},
 1243:     {ok,STM} =
 1244: 	gen_statem:start_link(
 1245: 	  ?MODULE, {map_statem,Machine,[]}, [{debug,[trace]}]),
 1246: 
 1247:     stopped = gen_statem:call(STM, stop),
 1248:     receive
 1249: 	{'EXIT',STM,shutdown} ->
 1250: 	    ok
 1251:     after 500 ->
 1252: 	    ct:fail(did_not_stop)
 1253:     end,
 1254: 
 1255:     {noproc,_} =
 1256: 	?EXPECT_FAILURE(gen_statem:call(STM, hej), Reason),
 1257:     case flush() of
 1258: 	[] ->
 1259: 	    ok;
 1260: 	Other2 ->
 1261: 	    ct:fail({unexpected,Other2})
 1262:     end.
